metro.GameScreen

Interface TrainInteractionTool

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StationPlacingTool, TrackPlacingTool, TrainLineSelectTool

    public interface TrainInteractionTool
    Every class that can edit trains, lines, stations, ... should implement this interface to be able to be used.
    Author:
    hauke

      • leftClick

        void leftClick(int screenX,
             int screenY,
             java.awt.geom.Point2D offset)
        Does things when the left mouse button was clicked.
        Parameters:
        screenX - The x-position of the click.
        screenY - The y-position of the click.
        offset - An offset for the click (e.g. for the map-offset)

        Parameters:
        screenX - The x-position of the click.
